scripts.build: run-s clean && run-p build-copy build-scripts build-pages build-styles && echo ✔ done production build
scripts.build:debug: run-s clean && run-p build-copy build-scripts:debug build-pages:debug build-styles:debug && echo ✔ done debug build
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && mkdirp dist/assets
scripts.build-copy: ncp assets dist/assets && ncp CNAME dist/ && ncp favicon.ico dist/ && ncp .nojekyll dist/ && ncp robots.txt dist/
scripts.build-scripts: browserify source/main.ts -p [ tsify ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] > dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js && uglifyjs -cm < dist/main.bundle.uncompressed.js > dist/main.bundle.js
